name: Guardian Of December
description: Go through ice cave, dungeon, temple, darkness collection, castle, swamp, fight the witch, vampires, monsters, undead creatures, magic animals and many more, get stronger, unlock new skills, get new weapons, customize your Guardian with helmets and wings you get from battles, get to know about different creatures, their stories...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7/Vista/XP Processor: CPU Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
